text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Today, it's raining heavier than it has<n>in a while.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It shouldn't affect our plan to weight<n>train indoors, though.
Or so I thought...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, how lustrously glossy my hair<n>looks when it's wet...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The skies were crying to look upon<n>my loveliness, and it's
the duty of a<n>ruler to bring comfort—even to the<n>heavens.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My ensemble with the rain began the<n>moment I set foot out
the door. It was<n>a sight to behold.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: You should've seen me running withthe storming wind, adorned inraindrops. There's no other word forit, but... perfect!
choice_data_list: You were running in this weather?!
You were running in this weather?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: How could I not?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Be they in drenching rain or on muddy<n>tracks, my strides
have stunning<n>power—they're beauty incarnate.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Whenever a poor soul longs to see<n>my running... I shall be
there, standing<n>in the spotlight, wherever the stage<n>may
be.
choice_data_list: No matter how bad it gets outside?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaah ha ha ha ha! That goes<n>without question.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
For I am to become the Centurial<n>Overlord, an unequalled
source of<n>radiance to the world.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Even the heaviest downpours and<n>bitterest blizzards must
yield to the<n>sun in the end.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Don't you see? If I cannot conquer<n>the weather, how am I
to conquer the<n>track?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
...But wait, Trainer. That awestruck<n>look in your
eyes—you've become<n>utterly infatuated with me.
choice_data_list: I'm dumbstruck by your intense passion.
I'm dumbstruck by your intense passion.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hah, you flatter me.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Though you needn't play coy.<n>Hesitate not to voice your<n>
thoughts—hold back your boundless<n>praise no longer!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Compliments and accolades, after all,<n>exist for my sake!
Now is the time,<n>Train—achoo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While she's been talking, a large<n>puddle has formed at her
feet from<n>how wet she is. She's sure to catch a<n>cold at
this rate...
choice_data_list: Maybe you should change into dry clothes.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What? I do not see the need for that...<n>Ah! Could it be,
Trainer?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Has my glistening appearance stirred<n>your soul? Has it
roused a bout of<n>bashfulness in you?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I understand what you must feel!<n>Before my unattainable
beauty, are<n>you ashamed to look so plain?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I push her out of the room before she<n>can launch into
another full-blown<n>soliloquy.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
How could you drive me away like<n>that to get dry clothes? I
still think<n>you've made a grave mistake.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You let the chance of a lifetime, to<n>bask in my rain-drenched
glory,<n>escape you forever.
choice_data_list: It's no good to anyone if you get sick.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, please. You shouldn't fear<n>something so inconceivable.
There's<n>only one future you need trust in.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That I am going to become the<n>Centurial Overlord and shine
my light<n>upon the world.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: With that settled, I've importanttraining to do. What would people sayif they saw me skipping a day'shard work?
choice_data_list: But your jersey's still all wet...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Forsooth, my uniform shall have to<n>suffice! Perhaps I'll go
for a youthful<n>frolic by the riverbed...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The flutter of my skirt and the power<n>of my strides
contrasted with the<n>delicate rain. Aaah, what a superb<n>
mise-en-scene it will be!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After that rambling, I'm almost too<n>worn out to say
otherwise, but I'm<n>desperate and summon my last<n>ounce
of courage to stop her.
